Headline: #55A 55th/Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/61st
ShortDescription: 55A 55th/Austin buses temp. rerouted SB: Austin, 61st, Narragansett, 65th, and Austin; NB: Austin, 63rd, Narragansett, 61st, and Austin near Austin/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55A 55th/Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due tostreet blockage near Austin/61st.

Southbound buses will operate via Austin, 61st, Narragansett, 65th, and Austin.

Northbound buses will operate via Austin, 63rd, Narragansett, 61st, and Austin.

Allow extra travel time.
